timeline.message:
docs: custom-server section

Instead of the highlighted comment about custom-servers we can have a section with an anchor to link to explicitly

timeline.bodyText: Maybe your application > an application you package`? I guess most people that repackage with something custom still wouldn't consider it their own application, but it is their package
timeline.author: anuraaga

 Zipkin Server is implemented with [Armeria](https://github.com/line/armeria). While it uses [Spring Boot](http://docs.spring.io/spring-boot/docs/current/reference/htmlsingle/)

-**Custom servers are not supported**
+## Custom servers are not supported
+
+By Custom servers we mean trying to use/embed `zipkin` as part of _your application_ (e.g. adding `zipkin-server` dependency to a Spring-boot application) instead of the packaged application we release.
